=== About Me ===

Hello, I'm a developer (Java) and I use Ubuntu since 2004. 
I recently passed the LPIC-1 certification to prove (to myself) that I really like this OS and that I'm interested about how it works. I passed this certification to be able to pass the "ubuntu certification" (lpi 199) but apparently it doesn't exist anymore...
